ketai.net.bluetooth

Class KetaiBluetooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • ketai.net.bluetooth.KetaiBluetooth

  • public class KetaiBluetooth
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class KetaiBluetooth manages the bluetooth connections and service on the android device. This class has been tested and can manage multiple simultaneous bluetooth connections. The maximum number of connections varied by device limitations but 3 simultaneous connections were typical. To receive data from bluetooth connections a sketch should define the following method:
    void onBluetoothDataEvent(String who, byte[] data)
    who - the name of the device sending the data
    data - byte array of the data received
